data.text: We loved our stay here and would recommend to anyone with a family.  The location is great and in a quiet neighborhood.  We were able to sleep with windows open which was very nice.  Breakfast was a huge plus too.
data.title: Great for Family

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Many thanks for your review.

We're thrilled to hear that you found our location ideal for your family and that the tranquility of the neighborhood contributed to a restful night's sleep with the windows open. It's wonderful to know our breakfast selection was a highlight of your stay, ensuring a great start to your day with both buffet and à-la-carte options. We're also delighted that the overall cleanliness and service provided by our team met your high standards, enhancing the quality of your visit.

We look forward to welcoming you back. 
Best wishes,

José Luis Fernández, General Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text:
The hotel was everything we hoped for. Everything was clean and the service was super friendly and nice. The bed was comfortable and soft.

The hotel is 40min walk from placa the Catalunya. Bus stops and metrostation are close. Nice restaurants close by.

We enjoyed our stay a lot and would definitely recommend.
data.title: Girls trip in bcn

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for this great review.

We're thrilled to hear that you found everything to your liking, particularly noting the cleanliness and friendliness of our service – two aspects we take great pride in. 

It's wonderful to know that our comfortable and soft beds contributed to a restful night's sleep, aligning with our aim to provide the best sleep quality possible. 

While the hotel's location was a bit of a walk from Placa Catalunya, we're glad you appreciated the proximity to public transportation and local dining options. 

Our team is dedicated to making every stay memorable and it's rewarding to see this reflected in your experience.

We hope to see you again in the future. 
Best regards,

José Luis Fernández, General Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: this is a lovely hotel to stay at for a few nights...we had two different room types...we had a two room suite and a terrace room....both rooms were very comfortable.... We preferred the terrace room because of the large outdoor terrace with a table and chair set and two recliner chairs...the terrace was quite large and got great morning sun....the bathroom had a shower...also the terrace room was just redone....we asked for a kettle and quickly received one...the staff is fantastic... friendly and extremely helpful...we did not eat breakfast in the restaurant....the room has a refrigerator which was helpful....if you have major mobility problems, know in advance that the elevator only goes up to the 5th floor....you need to walk up a flight of stairs...the room was spotless...
data.title: Just what is needed for a few nights.....

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for your feedback.

We're delighted to hear that you found the terrace room with its large outdoor terrace and morning sun to be very comfortable and that the quick provision of a kettle met your needs. 

It's wonderful to know that our team made a positive impression with their friendliness and helpfulness. We also appreciate your comments on the cleanliness of your room. 

Regarding elevator access, we offer a variety of room layouts, including duplex rooms located on the ground floor to accommodate guests who prefer not to use stairs.

We very much hope that we may be able to welcome you back in the future. 
With very best wishes,

José Luis Fernández, General Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: Room was very comfortable. Bed was great and the shower and tub in our suite was amazing. Location was perfect and the staff was always helpful. If you are looking for a nice small comfy hotel, this is the one.
data.title: Great Stay in Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at our hotel.

We're thrilled to hear that the comfort of your suite met your expectations, and that you found the bed to be great for a quality sleep. 

It's wonderful to know that our location was perfect for your needs, nestled in a peaceful residential area with the bustling heart of the city's shopping and business district nearby. 

Our team is delighted to have been of help throughout your stay, ensuring that every aspect of our service added to the enjoyment of your time in Barcelona.

We look forward to welcoming you back. 
Best regards,

José Luis Fernández, General Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: Perfect for the family, roomy and super clean suite, friendly and forthcoming staff. That would sum up our stay. The location of hotel is great, it is quiet neighbourhood, yet next to taxi station, and withing walking distance of most of the sights.
data.title: Perfect stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Branislav,
Thank you for sharing your kind review.

We're delighted to hear that you found our suites spacious and impeccably clean, which is a testament to our dedicated housekeeping staff. 

It's great to know that our team made a positive impact during your stay. 

We also appreciate your comments on our hotel's prime location, nestled in a tranquil neighborhood yet conveniently close to taxis and within walking distance to many attractions, ensuring a serene yet connected experience for our guests.

The entire team look forward to the pleasure of seeing you again on a future occasion. 
Best wishes,

José Luis Fernández, General Manager
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager
